attributes.action: Bring this petition to the attention of the Government  or Parliament
attributes.additional_details: Though the Covid 19 pandemic. Care homes have closed their doors to families of the residence's in their care.This means  residence's have rapidly declined though no contact with their love ones.We need this Government Legislation to make sure that at least one nominated person can always visit during any pandemic.This will bring an end to the suffering for all residence's  and families who have not being able to visit their love ones during these dreadful times.
attributes.background: We need a Government Legislation to make sure that at least one nominated person can always visit a relative in a Care Home during any pandemic.

rejection.details:
The Government have announced that from 8 March, a nominated person will be able to visit.  You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/visiting-care-homes-during-coronavirus/update-on-policies-for-visiting-arrangements-in-care-homes
